title: slurout
author: slurout
content: What happened:: A long time ago, there was some guy, who was scammed by a website, with the domain golddiamontminer.com https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5351695.msg57605821#msg57605821 <--- this was the topicThere were and these guys - SFR10 and logfiles, who found out another scam website of these people - cryptoexperticonminers.com Today I saw somewhere this new domain - Gold-diamondminer.com and the name looked familiar to me, so I started to wonder from where... Well, I remembered from where and came to look at the topic again.As I read the topic, I minimized the new domain of these scammers and saw this thing that was too funny to ignore: not minimized --> https://ibb.co/swK97nG  minimized --> https://ibb.co/xJsW9K2 No need to wonder if it's a scam site or not ! Reference Link: https://gold-diamondminer.com/Additional Notes: Beware of gold-diamondminer.com - it's a scam website.. It's an old scam website, with many faces!!

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: slurout on May 16, 2022, 12:24:17 PMA long time ago, there was some guy, who was scammed by a website, with the domain golddiamontminer.com Small correction: golddiamondminer.comQuote from: slurout on May 16, 2022, 12:24:17 PMAs I read the topic, I minimized the new domain of these scammers and saw this thing that was too funny to ignore: not minimized --> https://ibb.co/swK97nG  minimized --> https://ibb.co/xJsW9K2 I've never seen a website before that revealed its true nature when it's minimized [great catch, I'm going to use that technique from now on] ArchivedFound a few more:coinminermarket.com [archived - Creation Date: 2022-04-14] - Thanks to "google's cache", I was able to spot their new platform [it has a new logo]!cryptoexperticonminers.net [archived - Creation Date: 2021-11-02]cryptoexperticon-miners.com [archived - Creation Date: 2021-08-28]

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: This website is fake, it can be understood by checking some things. The social media link attached to this website does not work, which would not be the case with any original website. They have added these fake links to give the website a good look. Crypto users need to be more careful before falling into any of these scams.
